computation.worker.drive module¶

class computation.worker.drive.DriverBasedWorker(potter_, driver_=None, scheduler_=None, directory_=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: AbstractWorker

Monitor driver-based jobs.

Lifetime: queued (running) -> finished -> retrieved

Note

The database stores each unique job ID and its working directory.
